runs.comm: begins with one on the pads, tucked to the leg side
keeps it around leg stump, pitching outside and strikes the pad, a muted lbw appeal
backs away and drives this inside-out towards extra cover
length ball on off stump, pushed towards extra cover
Williamson going for a big drive through cover, a thick bottom edge and the ball bounces through to the keeper
a poor ball to end the over, a full toss down the leg side, swatted away behind square leg for four
length ball on off stump, defended from the crease
a length ball is driven firmly towards extra cover
down the leg side, guides the ball behind square leg for a single
slugs this towards midwicket for one more
extra bounce there, a thick outside edge sends the ball looping towards third man, that one took Guptill by surprise
short of length ball is guided down to third man, should have been a single, but a fumble from Steyn allows a second
lovely ball to start, back of a length and curving away outside off, Guptill's beaten
similar length, keeps it close to off, Guptill gets behind the line and defends
mistimes the push to the leg side, Steyn moves across quickly and dives in front of the non-striker to field that one, then glares at Guptill
length ball on off stump, defended to the leg side, terrific start from Steyn here
short of length ball on off stump, defended towards backward point for a single
brilliant from Steyn to close out his first over, Williamson wanted to steer that towards third man but doesn't get bat on ball, it was pretty close to off stump as well
looks to drive Tsotsobe but Guptill is beaten
length ball on off stump, defended to the off side for a quick single
well executed by Williamson, he moves well across and paddles that ball from way outside off past short fine leg for four
this time Williamson goes for a conventional T20 slog, looking to thrash the ball through the off after charging down the pitch, doesn't connect
cramps up the batsman by following him as Williamson moved away from leg
short of length ball outside off, Guptill wafts at it and is beaten
Williamson walks away from leg  to make room, Morkel follows him but Williamson can't still free his arms, launches this over cover, a one-handed shot that
tapped away for a single
short of length ball on middle, defended towards mid-on for one more
Williamson walks across the stumps this time, don't think he's played too many from a conventional position, looks to scoop that towards fine leg, no contact
this time he backs away from leg, a shortish ball outside off, Williamson connects well enough to send that over cover for four more, not a powerful hit
lovely from Williamson, he moves a touch towards off, gets on his knee and whips that down to fine leg
Tsotsobe keeping it on the pads, off the thigh pad and through to the keeper
Guptill finding it hard to get going here, blocked back towards the bowler
slower ball from Tsotsobe, Guptill spots it early, it was full as well, Guptill thumps this over mid-off for four more
drops it short, pulls away with authority past a diving midwicket
short of length ball is driven towards cover, can't find the gap
goes for another slower one, and it's gone for another boundary, not quite convincing from Guptill but that edge loops past short third man and runs away for four
Duminy drops it a bit short, scythe towards sweeper cover
down the leg side, clipped towards square leg for a single

that was a half-tracker, Guptill wanted to clobber that over midwicket and out of the stadium, he gets a thick bottom edge instead, and is alarmed for a moment, wondering where the ball has gone, not on to the stumps, bounces in front of him and the keeper collects after a bit of a struggle
eased towards wide mid-on
driven to mid-off for one more
on middle and leg, Williamson moves away to make room, slams this past point for another boundary

and he strikes immediately, with a short of length ball, no movement, Guptill wants to pull that away, gets a top edge and that loops up for a simple catch for de Kock who has to move some paces to his right to collect that
defended to the leg side
length ball is eased towards extra cover for a single
McCullum skips down the track first ball, pushes it towards backward point, McCullum decides to take on AB de villiers, who can't get a direct hit, which would have ended McCullum's innings
slow wide full ball, steered down to third man
length ball is pushed towards cover for a tight single, they consider whether there's time to take a run on the overthrow, but decide there isn't
Tahir starts with a straight ball heading for middle, hurries the batsman, who squeezes the ball towards cover
loopy one, outside off on a length, Williamson is struck on the pads by that googly
slammed towards long-on for a single
dropped. pushed back towards Tahir by Williamson, came at shoulder height for Tahir, not at too much pace, Tahir gets both hands to it, should have taken it

well, well, Tahir's mood has improved considerably just one ball after that drop as he gets the big wicket of McCullum, he fires this one way wide of the stumps, McCullum has been charging out every ball, he is out of the crease and nowhere near the ball, de Kock had a long time to take the bails off
a half-tracker first up for Taylor, clapped towards sweeper cover
drops it short again, helped to midwicket
full and well wide of off stump, the batsman can barely get bat on that, still gets it over the bowler's head for a single
length ball on the stumps, defended back towards the bowler
short of length ball wide of the stumps, driven towards sweeper cover
length ball well outside off, Williamson has moved across a long way, guides it behind backward point
again Albie bowls it far outside off, probably a wide if that was left alone, Taylor slaps it towards point
there's the Taylor swipe to midwicket, takes it from outside off and powers it for four
short again from Tahir, pushed towards wide mid-on
full toss from Tahir now, he's bowling it everywhere, this is put away beyond the midwicket boundary by Williamson
full ball is driven towards long-on for a single
fires it in a quick one down the leg side
length ball spinning away, eased towards cover for a single
spinning away after pitching on off, guided towards backward point for a single
fifty for Williamson, taps the ball towards backward point for a single, gets a handshake from Ross Taylor, no fist bumps for these guys
shot! powerfully struck by Taylor, a length ball outside off is clobbered over long-on, Steyn leaps acrobatically, but can't prevent the six
Twnety20 captured in two balls, the first was a powerful hit over long-on, this one a top-edge over the keeper for six more, Morkel won't want to take a look at his figures

three sixes in a  row! Taylor moves across and slams this behind square leg for another biggie, can't believe this was the bowler who was terrifying Australia with short-pitch stuff in the recent Tests
length ball is defended back towards Morkel, 2-0-36-0
length ball down the leg side, clipped behind square leg for two more, surely Steyn should have bowled this one
full toss on the pads, tapped to midwicket for a single
flighted full ball, is driven to mid-on for a single
googly, tapped towards midwicket, played gently enough to have time to take two
a ripping googly from Tahir, who thought he had Taylor bowled, he was halfway through his celebrations after that snuck through between bat and pad, over the stumps though
patted towards cover for a single
low full from Steyn, on off stump, tucked to the leg side for a single
short of length ball outside off, 146kph, Williamson beaten outside off

Steyn, to nobody's surprise, gets the breakthrough, this was pulled towards midwicket by Williamson, Ab de Villiers throws himself to his right in the deep to take a low catch, Steyn's made an impact but is it too late? end of a top innings from Williamson
short and wide, Taylor steers it towards deep backward point for a single
short of length ball on off stump, 138kph, defended towards point
quick first ball for Munro to deal with, 146kph, he's not sure how to deal with it, back of length and over the stumps, he looks to jab it to the off side, beaten
length ball on the pads, eased towards long-on
short of length ball from round the wicket, guided towards point
Taylor shuffles across and paddles it towards fine leg for two more
too wide from Duminy, Taylor has galloped to 47 off 23 with that four past backward point, a controlled shot this one, nicely done
full ball on the pads, guided down to fine leg
a reverse-sweep for four from Munro, what a way to get off the mark, powerfully hit past the man at deep point,  four more

Tsostsobe starts with a short of length ball, slapped towards Morne Morkel at cover, he tries to get the non-striker run-out, he misses, there's no one to back up, an overthrow, would have been a dot ball otherwise
slower one, full and outside off, nudged towards deep square leg
just outside off, dropped in front of point for the single that brings up Taylor's 50, just 26 balls too, he's having a great season
full ball on the pads, clipped towards deep square leg for one more
full and wide, slapped towards sweeper cover for a single, the batsmen might regret not letting that go, the umpire would have deemed it a wide
short ball, too high, over Munro's head and that's a wide
full ball following the batsman, inside-edges it away behind square leg
goes for the reverse once more, can't connect this time
that stayed quite low, Munro does well to get bat on it outside off, defended to the off

length ball is swiped towards deep midwicket, he picks out the man in the deep, and this is turning out to be a superb over from Tahir, three dot balls and a wicket, Tahir is off on his usual extravagant celebrations
almost carried back to Tahir, that would have totally changed the game, a checked drive from Taylor lands short of Tahir
full ball is driven to long-off for a single
full ball on the pads, Taylor can't get bat on it, and that ends a superb over from Tahir, just two off it, an over that has dragged SA back in the game?
short of length ball on the pads, clipped away towards deep backward square leg, a diving stop from Duminy keeps them to two

ooh! Steyn can't believe his luck as that top edge runs away for four, Anderson was completely cramped, hits hig on the blade, and de Kock leaps to try catch that, gets a glove on it but can't collect, gone for four, AB would have taken that?
Steyn strikes again, Anderson goes for another big shot, can't get the power, straight to long-on, New Zealand have lost another one
short of length ball curling away, 143kph, Taylor swishes at it and misses
another dot ball, Taylor again can't get bat on ball to a quick one outside off, no footwork at all as Taylor fishes at that one, what a bowler Steyn is!
pitched up and that is sent away towards deep backward point for two more
pitched up and that is lofted over mid-off for four, Ronchi starts strongly, this bat twirls in his hand as he plays that shot, but has enough to clear the infield
length ball, Ronchi cross bats it towards long-on for a single
full toss well outside off, scythed past point for four by Taylor, the game slipping away from SA
Morne sees Taylor moving across the stumps and fires it wide, that would have been a Test match wide, Morkel complains to the umpire saying Taylor had walked across the stumps
full and just outside off, Taylor can't get bat on that
keeps it full and wide, once more Taylor can't get bat on it, two dots from Morkel

Taylor finds the gap, there's was hardly any space between cover point and backward point, but Taylor sends that wide full toss to the point boundary, Morne can't believe it, the New Zealand dressing room are on their feet cheering that vital boundary, Morne finishes with 50

wow, what a start to the over from Steyn, gets the wicket of Ronchi, full ball just outside off, Ronchi backs away and looks to cross-bat it through the off side, a thick edge and de Kock does well to dive to his right to collect that, Steyn on fire
dot ball, Nathan McCullum what are you thinking? looking to whack that 143kph length ball out of the park, just get bat on ball and hand it to Taylor
another dot ball, 148kph from Steyn, pace and on short of a length just outside off, McCullum looking to work the ball to the leg side, can't get bat on it, can't get a bye either

this time Nathan McCullum connects, well enough to get a boundary, a length ball that N Mac pummels over extra cover, he shuffles across when Steyn was running in, then went back towards a normal position

Steyn gets another one, but Taylor is back on strike for the final ball, three needed, what a ripper this game is turning into, it was shortish and wide, hit the bottom of the bat as that looped towards extra cover, Faf has time to get around and collect it, Super Over coming up?

Steyn has done it! what a champion, this is sensational stuff, the final ball is well outside off, pitched up, Taylor can only bunt it back towards Steyn, who coolly collects it and runs towards the non-striker's end to complete the run-out, after that he is not cool any more, sprinting around in celebration before being surrounded by his team-mates, five dot balls in the final over, that is incredible stuff,wow, I could use a breather
